original_text: The leaders of the priests were very happy about this. They promised to give Judas some money. Then Judas waited for the right moment to help them to take hold of Jesus.
korean_text: 그들이 듣고 기뻐하여 돈을 주기로 약속하니 유다가 예수를 어떻게 넘겨 줄까 하고 그 기회를 찾더라

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the priests were very happy about this.
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들의 지도자들이 이 일로 매우 기뻐했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They promised to give Judas some money.
Then Judas waited for the right moment
to help them to take hold of Jesus.
